name: ExtMedicationAdministrationCategory
title: ext MedicationAdministration.Category
description: An extension that mimics the default FHIR `MedicationAdministration.category` element that can be used if multiple categories need to be captured. The zib profile fixes a zib definition code to `category` thereby denying the use for other purposes because of its 0..1 cardinality.
purpose: This extension represents the `category` element of the FHIR R4 MedicationAdministration resource. This extension is needed because `category` has a cardinality of 0..1  and the zib profile uses `category` with a fixed code, thereby denying the use of `category` for other purposes. A future version of FHIR will relax the cardinality to 0...* and the binding strength to _example_.
